mapper.select: select DATE(approved_at) orderdate, sum(mprice*quantity) total from gorany.order left join (select tid, sno, mprice, quantity from gorany.order_info info join gorany.partner_store_menu menu on info.mno = menu.mno) allorder on gorany.order.tid = allorder.tid where allorder.sno = 1 and MONTH(`approved_at`) = MONTH(curdate()) group by orderdate order by orderdate

select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`approved_at`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`approved_at`)-1) DAY), '%Y/%m/%d') as start, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(`approved_at`, INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(`approved_at`)-7) DAY), '%m/%d') as end, DATE_FORMAT(`approved_at`, '%Y%U') as 'week', sum(mprice*quantity) total FROM gorany.order join (select tid, mprice, quantity from gorany.order_info left join gorany.partner_store_menu on gorany.order_info.mno = gorany.partner_store_menu.mno) allorder on gorany.order.tid = allorder.tid where sno = 1 group by week order by start
